statements: SELECT * FROM ConflictResolution;
SELECT dispute_name, resolution_date FROM ConflictResolution;
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolution WHERE id = 1;
SELECT dispute_name, outcome FROM ConflictResolution WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolution ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolution WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT id, dispute_name FROM ConflictResolution WHERE outcome = 'Resolved' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT resolution_date, outcome FROM ConflictResolution WHERE dispute_name LIKE '%customer%' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT id, dispute_name, resolution_date, outcome FROM ConflictResolution ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_resolved FROM ConflictResolution WHERE outcome = 'Resolved';
SELECT * FROM disputes;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_description, resolution FROM disputes WHERE dispute_id = 1;
SELECT party_name, party_role FROM parties WHERE party_type = 'Plaintiff';
SELECT * FROM disputes ORDER BY dispute_id DESC;
SELECT party_name, dispute_description FROM parties INNER JOIN disputes ON parties.dispute_id = disputes.dispute_id;
SELECT * FROM disputes WHERE dispute_id = 1;
SELECT dispute_description, resolution FROM disputes WHERE resolution = 'settled';
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties WHERE party_role = 'plaintiff';
SELECT dispute_description, resolution FROM disputes JOIN parties ON disputes.dispute_id = parties.dispute_id WHERE party_type = 'individual';
SELECT dispute_id, party_name, party_type, resolution FROM disputes JOIN parties ON disputes.dispute_id = parties.dispute_id WHERE party_type = 'corporation';
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_disputes;
SELECT id, dispute_date, dispute_details FROM conflict_resolution_disputes;
SELECT party_id, party_name, party_role FROM conflict_resolution_parties WHERE party_role = 'Mediator';
SELECT outcome_id, outcome_type, outcome_date FROM conflict_resolution_outcomes WHERE outcome_type = 'Resolved' ORDER BY outcome_date DESC;
SELECT resolution_id, outcome_id FROM conflict_resolution_outcomes WHERE resolution_id IN (SELECT id FROM conflict_resolution_disputes WHERE dispute_date >= '2022-01-01');
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_disputes;
SELECT id, dispute_date, resolution_details FROM conflict_resolution_disputes ORDER BY dispute_date DESC;
SELECT party_id, party_name, party_role FROM conflict_resolution_parties WHERE party_role = 'Plaintiff';
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_outcomes WHERE outcome_type = 'Settlement' AND outcome_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT dispute_details, resolution_details, outcome_details FROM conflict_resolution_disputes JOIN conflict_resolution_outcomes ON conflict_resolution_disputes.id = conflict_resolution_outcomes.resolution_id;
SELECT * FROM Disputes;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM Parties WHERE party_type = 'Plaintiff';
SELECT dispute_description, resolution FROM Disputes ORDER BY dispute_date DESC;
SELECT outcome_description FROM Outcomes WHERE dispute_id = 3;
SELECT analysis_result FROM Analysis WHERE outcome_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Disputes WHERE dispute_id = 1;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM Parties WHERE party_type = 'Plaintiff';
SELECT dispute_description, resolution FROM Disputes ORDER BY dispute_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Outcomes JOIN Disputes ON Outcomes.dispute_id = Disputes.dispute_id;
SELECT party_name, party_contact FROM Parties WHERE party_type = 'Defendant' ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT dispute_name, dispute_description FROM disputes;
SELECT resolution_type, resolution_details FROM resolutions WHERE dispute_id = 1;
SELECT outcome_description, outcome_date FROM outcomes WHERE resolution_id = 2;
SELECT analysis_details, analysis_date FROM analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;

SELECT dispute_name, resolution_type, outcome_description FROM disputes JOIN resolutions ON disputes.dispute_id = resolutions.dispute_id JOIN outcomes ON resolutions.resolution_id = outcomes.resolution_id;
SELECT * FROM disputes;
SELECT dispute_name, dispute_description FROM disputes WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT disputes.dispute_name, outcomes.outcome_description FROM disputes JOIN resolutions ON disputes.dispute_id = resolutions.dispute_id JOIN outcomes ON resolutions.resolution_id = outcomes.resolution_id WHERE outcomes.outcome_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT analysis.analysis_id, analysis.analysis_details, outcomes.outcome_date FROM outcomes JOIN analysis ON outcomes.outcome_id = analysis.outcome_id ORDER BY analysis.analysis_date DESC;
SELECT dispute_name, resolution_type, resolution_details FROM resolutions JOIN disputes ON resolutions.dispute_id = disputes.dispute_id WHERE resolution_type = 'Mediation';
